name: Underlined Kajal Clean Waterproof Long-Wear Eyeliner
about: What it is: An ultra-smooth, waterproof, smudgeproof, drag-proof eyeliner with intense, long-lasting color that doesn't budge...Highlighted Ingredients: - Aloe Vera Extract: Ensures a creamy glide and drag-proof application..- Vitamin E: Moisturizes and acts as a free-radical fighting antioxidant...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Swap your liquid liner for this first-of-its-kind, award-winning kajal eyeliner. Combining the same intense pigment and longevity of a liquid eyeliner with the ease of a retractable liner, the drag-proof formula is infused with moisturizing aloe vera and vitamin E...This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner...This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner...This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner...CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness....Allure
ingredients: -Aloe Vera Extract: Ensures a creamy glide and drag-proof application..-Vitamin E: Moisturizes and acts as a free-radical fighting antioxidant...Isododecane, Polyethylene, Mica, Synthetic Wax, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Hydrogenated Polydicyclopentadiene, Polybutene, Tocopheryl Linoleate, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Octyldodecanol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Glide along your lash line, starting from the inner corner of your upper eyelid and staying as close to the lash line as you can..-Extend and lift the line upward and outward for a flawless wing..-For a softer look, use a small, dense brush or your finger to gently smudge...For a smoky eye:.-Wing out upper lash line with Nazar No More or Cheeky Chiku, then use the same shade on your bottom lash line and waterline, smudging out within 20 seconds of application...To tightline:.-Use Nazar No More or Cheeky Chiku to fill in any gaps in your upper waterline for a seamless look...Add a pop of color:.-Apply Rain Check, Purply Pataka, or Tiger Queen to your waterline...Pro tips:.-You have about 20 seconds before the liner fully sets, so make sure to move quickly if you are building a wing or smoking it out..-To sharpen, lay a tissue on a flat surface, then drag and twist the pencil to reshape the tip..-For long-lasting liner on your waterline, dry your waterline with a cotton swab before applying.
